availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of James Smith. Married to Mary J. Shelton Davis. Father of Sarah A. Davis, Milton C. Smith, Malissa Calcy Smith, and Lucy M. Smith. Student in Grainger County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Grainger County, District 13, p.112A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 3, p. 436A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 3, p. 219B.
Tennessee Death Records, 1908-1958, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, File #30052.
"John Smith (1835-1912)," Find A Grave, Memorial #79359794, accessed September 27, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/79359794/.
